categories: Category:Imperial Army personnel of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: Hirra was a male Human who was a corporal in the Imperial Army of the Sith Empire during the Cold War and Galactic War against the Galactic Republic, when he was stationed on Vaiken Spacedock.
Corporal Hirra appears in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, released by BioWare in 2011, as the Nar Shaddaa Equipment Commendations vendor on Vaiken Spacedock.
